criteria: Accuracy and Detail of Describing Customs
Accuracy and Detail of Describing Folklore Traditions
Breadth of Coverage of Various pre-Columbian Settlements
descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of the customs of pre-Columbian settlements.
The student mentions pre-Columbian settlements but provides inaccurate or very superficial details about their customs.
The student identifies pre-Columbian settlements and attempts to describe their customs, but the description lacks detail and may contain inaccuracies.
The student accurately describes a limited range of customs of pre-Columbian settlements, providing some detail.
The student comprehensively describes a variety of customs of pre-Columbian settlements with accurate and relevant details.
The student provides an exceptionally detailed and accurate description of a wide range of customs, demonstrating a deep understanding of their significance within pre-Columbian societies.
The student demonstrates no understanding of the folklore traditions of pre-Columbian settlements.
The student mentions pre-Columbian settlements but provides inaccurate or very superficial details about their folklore traditions.
The student identifies pre-Columbian settlements and attempts to describe their folklore traditions, but the description lacks detail and may contain inaccuracies.
The student accurately describes a limited range of folklore traditions of pre-Columbian settlements, providing some detail.
The student comprehensively describes a variety of folklore traditions of pre-Columbian settlements with accurate and relevant details.

The student provides an exceptionally detailed and accurate description of a wide range of folklore traditions, demonstrating a deep understanding of their significance within pre-Columbian societies.
The student does not address any pre-Columbian settlements.
The student mentions only one pre-Columbian settlement without describing its customs or folklore traditions.
The student identifies multiple pre-Columbian settlements but only describes the customs and folklore traditions of one.
The student describes the customs and folklore traditions of a few pre-Columbian settlements.
The student describes the customs and folklore traditions of several key pre-Columbian settlements, showcasing a good understanding of their diversity.
The student demonstrates comprehensive knowledge by describing the customs and folklore traditions of a wide range of pre-Columbian settlements, illustrating the breadth of pre-Columbian cultures.
